name: Belt of the Singing Blade
rules: When you draw a card, add a verse counter. [Exhaust], remove three verse counters -> Target weapon has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Gloves of Unerring Aim
rules: Opposing cards lose and can't have Untargetable. Damage your hero deals with abilities is Unpreventable. When your hero would deal damage with a weapon, it deals that much +1 instead.
flavour: I give ye my word, lad - they'll always point ye in the right direction. - Bragund Brightlink

name: Legwraps of the Master Conjurer
rules: At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your deck and remove it from the game face down. 2, Discard your hand, destroy this armor. -> Put each card you removed this way into your hand.

name: Wristwraps of the Cutthroat
rules: At the end of each opponent's turn, if a card didn't enter his graveyard this turn, he discards a card.
